area_name: A Cave of Kick Ass Community Contributions and Terminating Temptations

content.description: A twenty five foot traverse across the entire length, width, and breadth of the ceiling. Expect at least three sections of difficult, pumpy, endurance-fest climbing involving big jugs, precise feet, toe-hooks, compression moves, heel hooks, bat-hanging, crunches, cardio, and anything else your bouldering vocabulary has taught you. Exit out of the cave and top out.
content.location: Easy to find if you know what you are looking for. All the beta will be available when the newest version of Cronin's guidebook comes out within a year.

pathTokens: A Cave of Kick Ass Community Contributions and Terminating Temptations

content.description: Right across the road from Skeletal Remains (and below Community Cave's Terminator Ampitheator) lies the perfect bouldering area for the guy (or gal) who really wants to get hella pumped while his/her wife is in labor. For those who love crawling across a horizontal ceiling - while clinging tenateously to huge jugs - this area is a must do...especially if you are short on time yet need to get horizontal as hell and pumped like crazy. The close proximity to Spearfish will guarantee you will be home in time for dinner with the inlaws or back at the hospital before those contractions are less than four minutes apart.
